Posts.Content: Dec 11, 2017 08:55PM Kellirlane wrote: I am so sorry- I got my results this am too and it’s also invasive ductal carcinoma, with at least one lymph node involved. I’m devasted- we have 4 young children. My appt is also scheduled for Thursday. So many prayers for peace for you. I may also so anxious that it has spread everywhere. Please keep me posted.
Posts.Title: Just got the call LBoyMom claireinaz
